mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SCHEDULE ( GROUP_ID, SCHEDULE_TITLE, SCHEDULE_CONTENT, SCHEDULE_DATE, SCHEDULE_TIME, SCHEDULE_LOCATION ) VALUES ( #{groupId}, #{scheduleTitle}, #{scheduleContent}, #{scheduleDate}, #{scheduleTime}, #{scheduleLocation} )
mapper.select: SELECT SCHEDULE_ID as scheduleId, GROUP_ID as groupId, SCHEDULE_TITLE as scheduleTitle, SCHEDULE_CONTENT as scheduleContent, SCHEDULE_DATE as scheduleDate, SCHEDULE_TIME as scheduleTime, SCHEDULE_LOCATION as scheduleLocation FROM SCHEDULE WHERE GROUP_ID = #{groupId}
mapper.update: UPDATE SCHEDULE SET SCHEDULE_TITLE = #{scheduleTitle}, SCHEDULE_CONTENT = #{scheduleContent}, SCHEDULE_DATE = #{scheduleDate}, SCHEDULE_TIME = #{scheduleTime}, SCHEDULE_LOCATION = #{scheduleLocation} WHERE SCHEDULE_ID = #{scheduleId}
